Round Top & D-Type Bifocal Glasses – Ready Stock Available!

Get your hands on our ready-to-wear Round Top and D-Type bifocal glasses, specially designed for those with spherical power under +/- 300 and no cylinder power. Perfect for reading and daily use, these glasses combine style, comfort, and functionality.

Why Choose These Glasses?

Ready Stock: No waiting time – available for immediate use.

No Cylinder Power: Ideal for simple spherical prescriptions.

Stylish Frames: Choose between Round Top or D-Type designs.

Affordable & High-Quality: Clear vision without breaking the bank.
